coverLetter: I am very excited about the opportunity to work at Tech Corp. I have been following your work on open source projects and I believe my skills in React match the requirements perfectly.
I have a strong background in backend development and would love to contribute to your fintech solutions.
Robotics has always been my passion. I have experience with Python and hardware interfacing from my university projects.
Data analysis in healthcare allows for real impact. I am proficient in SQL and Tableau and eager to learn more.
I have a keen eye for design and user experience. Please find my portfolio attached.
